review: Can't believe what an incredible product this is for the price. Setup takes a just a couple minutes, and will require a computer connected to your WIRELESS network.  For instance, I didn't have my laptop at home when I initially received my Chromecast, and since my desktop only had a hard-wired connection, I was not able to use it to setup and configure my Chromecast.Other than that little hiccup, everything has been performing well above my expectations. I am shocked at how responsive the device is, and things are only getting better with the feature set of the device, as more and more app move to support Chromecast. This is a no-brainer.
author: Clark H. Wells

review: So glad that I was able to get in on the deal with 3 free months of Netflix streaming.  Made the purchase a no brainer.  Already had Netflix streaming through our Blu-Ray player, but the ease of use is so much better with this.  My kids use the tablet to control it when they want to watch cartoons and they have no problems doing that.

review: I have an Xbox which I normally use for HDMI movies.  I, personally, believe the Chromecast output is cleaner and it is usually easier to load up with my phone.  Although in some places in my house the wifi is spotty, it seems to get a decent reception in places where other devices do not pick up.My Chromecast does not get detected by my phone unless the TV is on and the right input is selected, which is contrary to the Google reveal video.  Hopefully this gets resolved soon, but I had ordered two and am still eagerly awaiting the second unit.
